Package business

Class StudentModuleAssignment

java.lang.Object
business.StudentModuleAssignment
All Implemented Interfaces:
IStudentModuleAssignment
public class StudentModuleAssignment
extends java.lang.Object
implements IStudentModuleAssignment
Manages the assignment of modules to students. This class handles the persistence and retrieval of module assignments, including functionality to generate initial assignments for new students and update existing assignments.

    • StudentModuleAssignment

      public StudentModuleAssignment​(int studentId, java.util.List<java.lang.String> moduleIds)
      Constructs a new StudentModuleAssignment instance.
      Parameters:
      studentId - The unique identifier of the student
      moduleIds - List of module IDs to be assigned to the student. If null, an empty list will be created

    • loadAssignments

      public static java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,​StudentModuleAssignment> loadAssignments() throws java.io.IOException
      Loads all student module assignments from the JSON storage file. Creates a new empty map if the file doesn't exist.
      Returns:
      Map of student IDs to their corresponding module assignments
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - If there is an error reading from the file

    • saveAssignments

      public static void saveAssignments​(java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,​StudentModuleAssignment> assignments) throws java.io.IOException
      Saves all student module assignments to the JSON storage file.
      Parameters:
      assignments - Map of student IDs to their corresponding module assignments
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - If there is an error writing to the file

    • generateInitialAssignments

      public static void generateInitialAssignments() throws java.io.IOException
      Generates initial module assignments for all students in the system. Students are assigned all modules associated with their course.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - If there is an error accessing the storage file

    • generateInitialAssignments

      public static void generateInitialAssignments​(int studentId, java.lang.String courseCode) throws java.io.IOException
      Generates initial module assignments for a specific student. The student is assigned all modules associated with their course.
      Parameters:
      studentId - The unique identifier of the student
      courseCode - The course code for which to generate module assignments
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - If there is an error accessing the storage file or generating assignments

    • updateStudentAssignments

      public static void updateStudentAssignments​(int studentId, java.util.List<java.lang.String> moduleIds) throws java.io.IOException
      Updates the module assignments for a specific student.
      Parameters:
      studentId - The unique identifier of the student
      moduleIds - List of new module IDs to be assigned
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - If there is an error accessing the storage file

    • getStudentAssignments

      public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> getStudentAssignments​(int studentId) throws java.io.IOException
      Retrieves the current module assignments for a specific student.
      Parameters:
      studentId - The unique identifier of the student
      Returns:
      List of assigned module IDs. Returns an empty list if no assignments exist
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - If there is an error accessing the storage file
